TEXT.S:
Quri i Taoyuan a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Quri. u kasalumaluma' nu Quri sa, 11 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 31 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 28 ku tademaw, pakalatu 90%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 3 ku tademaw, pakalatu 10%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 87%, zumazuma 3%.
Quri i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Quri. u kasalumaluma' nu Quri sa, 69 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 315 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 299 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 16 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 2%.
